articles.description: Birmingham City were beaten 2-0 by Middlesbrough last night - this is what their head coach had to say about it
articles.content:
Lee Bowyer spoke with the media after Birmingham City's 2-0 defeat to Middlesbrough after they conceded a goal in each half and saw Kristian Pedersen sent off.
Here's a transcript of what was discus… [+3192 chars]

articles.author: Ciaran Kelly
articles.title: Ryan Fraser apologises after what happened on Eddie Howe's first day at Newcastle to anger Scots - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Newcastle United winger Ryan Fraser has been in fine form but won't be involved in Scotland's friendly against Poland next week after withdrawing from the squad last November
articles.content:
Ryan Fraser has apologised to Scotland boss Steve Clarke after training with Newcastle United just days after withdrawing from international duty.
